name: The Warrior
description:
You are Tom, one of the few convicts left after an outbreak has gone wrong. You must escape the prison and make sure you don't get spotted by "the warrior".

  • Find a way to escape prison, by destroying doors.
  • Use Roid Rage to smash guards.
  • Hide from enemies by locking doors or by dropping the soap.

The choice is yours.






Notice: Some game modes are not yet available as this game is still in a early version and will subject to change.
